named-query.name: findAllTours
named-query.query: SELECT t from Tour t order by t.name

named-query.name: findTourByOwner
named-query.query: SELECT t from Tour t where t.owner = :owner order by t.name

named-query.name: findTourByOthers
named-query.query: SELECT t from Tour t where not t.owner = :owner order by t.name

named-query.name: findTourByName
named-query.query: SELECT t from Tour t where t.name = :name

named-query.name: findStagesByTour
named-query.query: SELECT s from Stage s where s.tour = :tour order by s.startdate

named-query.name: findAllEntries
named-query.query: SELECT e from BlogEntry e order by e.lastUpdated

named-query.name: findEntriesByOwner
named-query.query: SELECT e from BlogEntry e where e.owner = :owner order by e.lastUpdated

named-query.name: findEntriesByOthers
named-query.query: SELECT e from BlogEntry e where not e.owner = :owner order by e.lastUpdated

named-query.name: findEntriesByTour
named-query.query: SELECT e from BlogEntry e where e.tour = :tour order by e.lastUpdated

named-query.name: findCommentByEntry
named-query.query: SELECT c from Comment c where c.id = :id AND c.blogEntry = :entry order by c.dateCreated

named-query.name: findCommentsByEntry
named-query.query: SELECT c from Comment c where c.blogEntry = :entry order by c.dateCreated

named-query.name: findPicturesByOwner
named-query.query: SELECT p from Picture p where p.owner = :owner order by p.name

named-query.name: findPicturesByOthers
named-query.query: SELECT p from Picture p where not p.owner = :owner order by p.name

named-query.name: findPicturesByTour
named-query.query: SELECT p from Picture p where p.tour = :tour order by p.name

named-query.name: findAllMembers
named-query.query: SELECT m from Member m order by m.name
